name: Naruto Uzumaki
info: A ninja of the Hidden Leaf Village with dreams of becoming Hokage.

name: Goku
info: A Saiyan raised on Earth, known for his strength and pure heart.

name: Monkey D. Luffy
info: Captain of the Straw Hat Pirates, dreaming of finding the One Piece.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
info: A skilled ninja from the Uchiha clan driven by revenge.

name: Levi Ackerman
info: A captain in the Survey Corps, known as humanity's strongest soldier.

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
info: A teenager who becomes a Soul Reaper to protect the living from evil spirits.

name: Light Yagami
info: A high school student who gains the power to kill anyone by writing their name.

name: Edward Elric
info: A young alchemist searching for the Philosopher's Stone to restore his brother's body.

name: Killua Zoldyck
info: An assassin from a notorious family who befriends Gon on his journey.

name: Gon Freecss
info: A boy who becomes a Hunter to find his father.

name: Saitama
info: A hero who can defeat any opponent with one punch.

name: Todoroki Shoto
info: A student hero with the power of ice and fire.

name: Izuku Midoriya
info: A quirkless boy who inherits One For All to become a hero.

name: Tanjiro Kamado
info: A kind-hearted demon slayer fighting to cure his sister.

name: Nezuko Kamado
info: Tanjiro's sister turned into a demon, fighting her urges to help humans.

name: Itachi Uchiha
info: A complex ninja who sacrificed everything for peace.

name: Kakashi Hatake
info: A copy ninja and former leader of Team 7.

name: Vegeta
info: A Saiyan prince and rival to Goku.

name: Rem
info: A loyal maid who develops strong feelings for Subaru.

name: Emilia
info: A half-elf girl vying to be the next ruler of Lugnica.

name: Spike Spiegel
info: A bounty hunter with a haunted past.

name: Zero Two
info: A mysterious girl known as the Partner Killer.

name: Eren Yeager
info: A determined youth who vows to destroy all titans.

name: Mikasa Ackerman
info: Eren's adopted sister and elite soldier.

name: Rukia Kuchiki
info: A Soul Reaper who gives Ichigo his powers.

name: Saber
info: A heroic spirit summoned to fight in the Holy Grail War.

name: Shinra Kusakabe
info: A firefighter with the power of igniting his feet.

name: Ken Kaneki
info: A college student turned half-ghoul after a transplant.

name: Rintarou Okabe
info: A self-proclaimed mad scientist who discovers time travel.

name: Yato
info: A minor god striving to become famous and build his shrine.
